content: layla is the newest addition to the b hooked crochet family of free patterns and she s definitely one of the brightest i had so much fun creating her she is the cutest crochet bunny around crochet stuffed animals or amigurumi as it s often referred to as is one of my favorite forms of crochet it s so neat watching all the pieces come together and it leaves so much room for creativity when crafting layla i had sweet and simple in mind i wanted to create a bunny that looks professional but is easy to crochet she came together in about 5 short evenings of crochet so you have plenty of time to make a few easter layla s of your own
